title: Suricata - SMB (DCERPC, NTLMSSP, Kerberos)
description: - This dashboard provides information of SMB logs generated in Suricata.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides information of SMB logs generated in Suricata.

## Widgets
1. Avg. Size of Requested File
2. Distribution by Share Types
3. Maximum Size of Requested File
4. Distribution of events by Protocol Version
5. Top 10 Commands
6. Top 10 SMB Status
7. Distribution by File Access Type
8. Top 10 Requested Disposition
9. Top 10 File Names
10. SMB Log Details
11. Distribution by Commands
12. Distribution by Replies
13. DCERPC Log Details
14. Top 10 Windows Domains
15. Top 10 Users
16. Top 10 Hosts
17. Top 10 Client Versions
18. NTLMSSP Log Details
19. Total Kerberos Authentication Requests
20. Top 10 Service Names
21. Top 10 Kerberos Realms
22. Kerberos Log Details

definition.title: Distribution of events by Protocol Version
